titleStmt.title: To MARGUERITE POWER,Marguerite Agnes Power (1815-67), niece of CD’s friend the Countess of Blessington. She edited The Keepsake (1851-7), and published a number of novels, including Evelyn Forester (1856), The Foresters (1858), The Letters of a Betrothed (1858), Nelly Carew (1859) and Sweethearts and Wives (1861). In 1860 she wrote Virginia’s Hand, a long narrative poem dedicated to John Forster. 28 DECEMBER 1859
